snippet: Twice grand slam winner Stan Wawrinka rallied from 5-2 down in the second set to clinch victory over Italian Alessandro Giannessi on Thursday and reach the third round of the U.S. Open....
lead_paragraph: Twice grand slam winner Stan Wawrinka rallied from 5-2 down in the second set to clinch victory over Italian Alessandro Giannessi on Thursday and reach the third round of the U.S. Open.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Rolls Into Third Round at U.S. Open
headline.main: Wawrinka Rolls Into Third Round at U.S. Open
